lines.text: I had a moment of religious epiphanosity.
Aren't you gonna wash your hands?
I wash my hands *before* I touch my dick.
Black people don't get no credit for nothing. All we've got is one word. That word is motherfucker.
It's entertainment, baby! You love my black ass! 'Cause I'm exciting!
[about Mike Tyson biting off Evander Holyfield's ear]
Tyson will be heavyweight champ again. And this time, you'll pay twice as much to see it. Why? Because y'all part of the same hypocrisy.
Y'know who's a motherfucker? The devil's a motherfucker.
many fighters step into the ring, but only one is still king.
I don't see you making a movie about Bob Arum.
If you didn't have Don King, you'd have to invent him.
